## Return Value

The shared dialog controller.

## Discussion

You can use the shared dialog controller or create your own [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKDialogController] object. For example, you can create separate [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKDialogController] objects for different windows.

# shared()

**Type Method**

Retrieves the shared instance of the dialog controller.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func shared() -> GKDialogController
```

## Return Value

The shared dialog controller.

## Discussion

You can use the shared dialog controller or create your own [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKDialogController] object. For example, you can create separate [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKDialogController] objects for different windows.
title: shared()
